author: Kate Cox
title: Google knows if everyone in your county is actually staying home or not
description: Google knows where billions of phones are—and more importantly right now, aren't.
content:
Enlarge/ The reports are all public, but the nifty magnifying glass effect is not actually included.
2 with 2 posters participating
The entire world is scrambling to mitigate the novel coronavirus pandemic. By now, a majority of US states are under some kin… [+4350 chars]
